name: Marble Break
description:
Are you a super fan of marble games? If the answer is yes, this is the game that you must have.
It has a lot of new items to make the game much more interesting and challenging.

How to play:
1. Touch the area of the screen where you want to shoot.
2. Group 3 or more identical marbles together to clear them.
3. Swap the shooting marble by touching the marble emitter.
